description: Foundation level chess training for new players. Learn basic piece movements, board setup, and fundamental strategies.

levels.description: Introduction to chess pieces, board setup, and basic movements
Basic tactics, checkmate patterns, and opening principles

description: Advanced tactics and strategy development for players with basic chess knowledge. Improve tactical vision and positional understanding.

levels.description: Tactical motifs, pawn structures, and middle game planning
Advanced tactics, endgame fundamentals, and strategic concepts

description: Expert level training and tournament preparation for serious players. Master complex strategies and compete at higher levels.

levels.description: Complex endgames, positional play, and calculation techniques
Opening repertoire, tournament preparation, and psychological aspects
